alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Tammany, southeastern Washington Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bush, or 12 miles northeast of Covington, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Sun and Bush. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
